basic_information.scholarship_name: The GIS Beta Epsilon Leadership Scholarship

description: Eligibility Requirements The President of The GIS Beta Epsilon A.K.A. The Actuary, Insurance and Risk Management Club President must be in good standing - if the President is not in good standing then the VP/President-Elect will be awarded 3.0 GPA
